name: ADHDroids
description:
The ship has crashed, and so did its AI

Most of the control units are dead and have to be repaired.

The problem is, the AI is glitching out and switches the controllable unit every 10 seconds.

Gather resources, bring them to the central module and craft other units to gather other resources to bring them to the central module to escape.

Collect 10 of each resource at the central control station to escape. Control units 

Chris, specializes in crystals

  

Mel, specializes in metals

  

Walter, very fast, specializes in water

  

Grace,  digs dirt very fast, specializes in grass

  

Matt, can take a few hits, specializes in meat gathering

  

Control station

Located in the middle of the area

Stores resources and heals the unit (on Right Click)

Rebuilds control units that were broken (on E)

Can be launched into space with 20 of each resources collected

Controls

WASD to move

Left Click to gather and attack

Right Click near control station to store resources and heal

E to open and close crafting menu near control station

World Map

game made solo in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 51 Compo
